<title level="1" right="Rules">[Narrow Surfaces](/Rules.aspx?ID=455)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 476 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
A narrow surface is so precariously thin that you need to Balance (see [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1)) or risk falling. Even on a success, you are flat-footed on a narrow surface. Each time you are hit by an attack or fail a save on a narrow surface, you must succeed at a Reflex save (with the same DC as the Acrobatics check to Balance) or fall.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
